{{Description|"My time is most precious, and I shall not waste it on the likes of you... Go, Oz, fall upon them, and bring down upon them your Rachsüchtig Blitz, that which tears open the long night."<br>&mdash;[[Flowers for Princess Fischl]] (IV): Farewell Frau Welt}}
'''Nightrider''' is [[Fischl]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* Oz attacks at 1-second intervals.
* {{Talent Note|particles|each of Oz's attacks|0.67}}
* {{Talent Note|cooldown|immediate}}
** As a result, cooldown reduction effects that shorten ongoing cooldowns, such as the [[Thundering Fury]] 4-piece set bonus, can activate while Oz is on the field, even though the cooldown is not visible. (However, since this effect has a trigger requirement, it still requires Fischl to be on-field in order to activate.)
** Effects that alter cooldowns multiplicatively, such as [[Ley Line Disorder|Slowing Water]], will be calculated using the base 25 seconds, not the time left after Oz disappears. For example, a [[Reduce CD]] value of &minus;80.0% will cause the full cooldown to become 45 seconds, which means that the cooldown of this skill will appear as 35 seconds when Oz disappears after a duration of 10 seconds.
* {{Talent Note|snapshot|Oz's ATK DMG|character=Fischl|snapshottime=when casting and when repositioning Oz}} The buffs applied upon casting will also apply to her [[Undone Be Thy Sinful Hex|4th Ascension Passive]] and [[Evernight Raven|6th Constellation]] throughout Oz's duration.
